thread.section_title: Enlightium Academy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Enlightium Academy | enlightiumacademy.com
thread.title: Cindy Alkire
thread.title_full: Enlightium Academy reviewed by Cindy Alkire

author: Cindy Alkire
title: Cindy Alkire
text: My daughter is now doing really well in school. She has dyslexia and ADD, so there were a lot of distractions in the classroom. When she was in public school she was stressed out and didn't perform to her full potential. In a month she has begun working at a level above where she was in public school. We love that Biblical content is integrated throughout the curricilum!
